page.syntax: WHILE Logical_Expression statements EXIT WHILE END WHILE WHILE Logical_Expression statements EXIT WHILE WEND

argument.name: Logical_Expression
argument.description: An expression that evaluates to .T. (TRUE) or .F. (FALSE).

page.description: Repeats the statements it contains while the Logical Expression evaluates to TRUE
page.discussion: WHILE ... END WHILE is a control structure that repeats the statements it contains while the Logical Expression evaluates to TRUE. Execution resumes at the line following the end while statement when the Logical Expression is FALSE or when the EXIT while statement is encountered.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script searches for a customer whose last name is 'Smith'.
section.example: dim lFound as l lFound = .f. tbl = table.current() search_name = "Smith" tbl.fetch_first() while .not. tbl.fetch_eof() if (trim(tbl.last_name) = search_name) then lFound = .t. exit while end if tbl.fetch_next() end while if lFound ui_msg_box("Search", search_name + " has been found.") else ui_msg_box("Search", "Not Found.") end if
